snippet: The cast members of "Jersey Shore" will be among those featured in a Nov. 15 fundraising special on MTV that will benefit reconstruction efforts in Seaside Heights, N.J., where that reality series is filmed.
abstract: The cast members of "Jersey Shore" will be among those featured in a Nov. 15 fundraising special on MTV that will benefit reconstruction efforts in Seaside Heights, N.J., where that reality series is filmed.

headline.print_headline: MTV Schedules a Fund-Raiser, ‘Restore the Shore,’ for Next Week
